blogPost.title: What is your best advice for engaging employees in a remote environment? Answer by @hollysirkin, VP of People at Unison. https://t.co/nhTTDKboJu https://t.co/QowBUqzYbo
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: リモート環境で従業員をエンゲージするための最良のアドバイスは何ですか？回答者：@hollysirkin（UnisonのPeople担当副社長） https://t.co/nhTTDKboJu https://t.co/QowBUqzYbo
对于在远程环境中吸引员工，你有什么好的建议？回答者：@hollysirkin，Unison的人事副总裁。https://t.co/nhTTDKboJu https://t.co/QowBUqzYbo
對於在遠程環境中吸引員工，你有什麼好的建議？回答者：@hollysirkin，Unison的人事副總裁。https://t.co/nhTTDKboJu https://t.co/QowBUqzYbo

previous.title: What are the first five things a company should do before launching? Answer by @eytanbensoussan, Co-Founder of @northonebanking. https://t.co/zhmEiS55pp https://t.co/DKYXLAzq9P

localize.full_text: 会社が立ち上げる前に最初にすべき5つのこととは？answer by @eytanbensoussan, Co-Founder of @northonebanking. https://t.co/zhmEiS55pp https://t.co/DKYXLAzq9P
一家公司在推出之前应该做的前五件事是什么？回答者：@eytanbensoussan，@northonebanking的联合创始人。https://t.co/zhmEiS55pp https://t.co/DKYXLAzq9P
一家公司在推出之前應該做的前五件事是什麼？回答者：@eytanbensoussan，@northonebanking的聯合創始人。https://t.co/zhmEiS55pp https://t.co/DKYXLAzq9P

next.title: How do you navigate Silicon Valley as a black entrepreneur? Answer by Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9), Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/2MCoElh3Lv https://t.co/znsjTR7Lv5

localize.full_text: 黒人起業家としてシリコンバレーをどのようにナビゲートするのか？回答者：Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9), Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/2MCoElh3Lv https://t.co/znsjTR7Lv5
作为一个黑人企业家，你如何在硅谷航行？回答者：Deon Nicholas（@dojiboy9），联合创始人& CEO @forethought_ai。https://t.co/2MCoElh3Lv https://t.co/znsjTR7Lv5
作爲一個黑人企業家，你如何在硅谷航行？回答者：Deon Nicholas（@dojiboy9），聯合創始人& CEO @forethought_ai。https://t.co/2MCoElh3Lv https://t.co/znsjTR7Lv5
